entry.title: Try Some Code Using Gist
entry.content:
Okay, now let’s give this Gist thing a spin. This is the same code but the sample is generated using a Gist repo from Github.

I embedded the gist reference here but I don’t know how to quote it properly.

How does that look? Result: It didn’t work. I’m not sure why. maybe it’s because I was using a private Gist.

entry.title: Try Some Code
entry.content:
Here’s an example of a bit of code. I was writing a Pong Python example that was being used in a class.

``` python class Position(Vector): “”“The x, y position of an object.”“”

class Velocity(Vector): “”“The x, y velocity components of an object.”“”

class Ball(object): “”“A ball with a position and velocity.”“”

def init(self, pos, vel):

"""Initialize the position and velocity."""

self.pos = pos
self.vel = vel

def move(self, deltat):

"""Move the ball over a period of delta t."""

self.pos.x += self.vel.x * deltat
self.pos.y += self.vel.y * deltat

```
